list.title: 5·18 Memorial Park (5·18 기념공원)
list.description: The 5·18 Memorial Park was established to remember the May 18 Democratization Movement. The park houses various historical and cultural facilities, including the 5·18 Library, 5·18 Cultural Center, Education Center, Daedong Plaza, Owoldae Tower, and other memorial sculptures and monuments. The park is also home to Mugaksa Temple and walking paths.
list.author: korea-tour
